abstract.text: Structure containing the methods related to the Apple Music catalog.
Fetch a record label from the Apple Music catalog by using its identifier.
Adds a rating for a station in the Apple Music catalog.
Fetch multiple radio shows from the Apple Music catalog by using their identifiers.
Get the rating for a playlist in the catalog.
Fetch multiple record labels from the Apple Music catalog by using their identifiers with all properties.
Fetch an album from the Apple Music catalog by using its identifier.
Fetch one or more songs from Apple Music catalog by using their ISRC value.
Delete a rating for a station in the catalog.
